title: LMARV-1 reboot part 6: About CSRs and interrupts

media:group.media:title: LMARV-1 reboot part 6: About CSRs and interrupts
media:group.media:description:
This part explains a bit about CSRs (Control and Status Registers) and how interrupts get handled.

nMigen exercises: https://github.com/RobertBaruch/nmigen-exercises/blob/main/README.md

github repo for code: https://github.com/RobertBaruch/riscv-reboot
